QuestData.Title: The Axe of Kor'gall
QuestData.Description: Time for vengeance! We are going to kill Kor'gall and you are going to take his axe.$b$bShatter this feeble barrier, follow the bridge beyond until you reach the chieftain's throne.$b$bYou freed us, so the honor of first blood is yours. Strike the first blow and we will join you in the cutting.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Kor'gall and retrieve his axe, Serathil.
QuestData.RewardText: This blade has caused enough pain and suffering for one lifetime. We shall see to it that it is properly disposed of.
